summary: After witnessing an act of unprecedented violence without even flinching, an emotionally numb real-estate agent visits his ailing mother at the hospital, and then, the graveyard. Is there a speck of happiness in this cruel and short life?
cast: Klas-Gösta Olsson|Lennart Björklund|Christer Christensen|Bernard Eiger|Rolf Engström|Gun Fors|Udo Kühnapas|Hans Söderblom|Anne Tubin
title: Härlig är jorden
